name: Clean Interface for Gmail
description: A much cleaner, lightweight and touch-friendly user interface for your Gmail.
additional_info: Version 1.2.0 Changelog: - We are working to make this Style even better! - We changed the font family to Roboto for easier reading at lower resolutions. - Correction of a serious bug that prevented the Google logo from displaying correctly. - Bug fixes and stability improvements. Known Issues: - This Style is not fully compatible with some features of Gmail Labs, like the 'Preview Pane'. We're working on it. - If you find something wrong, leave your feedback! We'll be happy to answer you. This Style was tested in: Google Chrome 50+. Observation: Works better in English/United States. If you are experiencing any problems, try changing the display language to English (United States). Important: This style is compatible with the 'Ink for Google' extension. This style is based on: Clean UI for Gmail from Guari
